snippet: The success of the documentary film “2016: Obama’s America” reflects a new marketing strategy on the part of some conservative political and religious filmmakers: open in Texas first.
lead_paragraph: The success of the documentary film “2016: Obama’s America” reflects a new marketing strategy on the part of some conservative political and religious filmmakers: open in Texas first.

headline.seo: ‘2016’ Obama Film and the Case for Conservative Texas Premieres
headline.main: Giving Conservative Films a Head Start, Right Here
headline.print_headline: Giving Conservative Films A Head Start, Right Here
